ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: He saw him again another time
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: He saw Him indeed another time
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Indeed he saw him a second time,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: He certainly saw him (Gabriel) during his other ascent
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And indeed he did see the Spectacle again.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And indeed he saw him at a second descent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And certainly he saw him in another descent,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Indeed, he saw him another time
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And verily he saw him yet another time
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: And certainly he saw him descend a second time:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And assuredly he saw him at another descent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Certainly he saw it yet another time,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: For indeed he saw him at a second descent,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And indeed he (Muhammad SAW) saw him [Jibrael (Gabriel)] at a second descent (i.e. another time).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, he saw him in another descent
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: He saw him on another descent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And he certainly saw him in another descent
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [53:13] And verily he saw him, in his [true] image, another time,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And verily he saw him) i.e. Muhammad (pbuh) saw Gabriel; and it is said he saw his Lord with his heart; and it is said he saw his Lord with his eyes, (yet another time) other than the time about which he informed you,
